tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    total_purchases INT,
    total_spent DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
 purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id UUID,
 purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
 purchase_amount DECIMAL,
 FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE customers ( customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, customer_name STRING, purchase_history JSONB )
CREATE TABLE segments ( segment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, segment_name STRING, criteria JSONB )
CREATE TABLE recommendations ( recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id), recommendation_text STRING )
CREATE TABLE segments_customers ( segment_id UUID REFERENCES segments(segment_id), customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id) )

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT,
  total_purchase_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  purchase_date DATE,
  amount_purchased DECIMAL,
  product_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  category TEXT,
  price DECIMAL,
  stock_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  recommended_product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
  recommendation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
  segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  segment_name TEXT,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
)
